name: NYCASP Parking Notifier
description: Get a text message when there is not need to move your car in the eveving.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Account SID - you can get it from https://www.twilio.com/console after signing in.

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Auth Token - you can get it from https://www.twilio.com/console after signing in.

TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER.description: Your registered Twilio phone number. Messages will be sent from this number.

TWILIO_TO_NUMBER.description: Phone number where messages are meant to be sent.

TWITTER_API_KEY.description: API Key - you can get it in the apps menu from https://developer.twitter.com/en/apps/

TWITTER_API_SECRET_KEY.description: API Secret Key - you can get it in the apps menu from https://developer.twitter.com/en/apps/

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Access Token - you can get it in the apps menu from https://developer.twitter.com/en/apps/

TWITTER_ACCESS_SECRET_TOKEN.description: Access Secret Token - you can get it in the apps menu from https://developer.twitter.com/en/apps/
